Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Coney Island in 1970...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 2/6/1984 to a 2-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
Had 2000th career hit on 4/19/1984, off Riley Stiff (WIS)...
